) const mapState = state => ({ show: state.getIn(['explore', 'show']) }) const mapDispatch = dispatch => ({ handleMore () { dispatch(actionCreators.showDownload()) }, handleClose () { dispatch(actionCreators.closeDownload()) } }) export default connect( mapState, mapDispatch )(DownloadApp)
